text: (Yi) timro sahayatama purai kanjusya'i gardachan. Ani jaba bhaya ra darako samaya a'umcha ta tapar'inle unala'i hernuhunecha ki tapar'intira herirakheka hunchan, ra unaka amkhaharu yasari ghumchan jasto ki kasaila'i mrtyuko murcha bha'irakheko cha. Kintu jaba bhaya samapta huncha taba uniharule aphna tikho jibrole thula thula kura garna thalchan. Yiniharu dhanaka dherai lobhi hunchan, yiniharule imana lya'ekai chainan. Tasartha allahale uniharuko sabai karmala'i nasa paridi'eko cha ra yo allahako lagi dherai sajilo cha
